EmailTemplate.name: CSM QSOL Completed Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request {!Case.CaseNumber} has been completed for QSOL and granted access to All users.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your request for QSOL has been completed and all users have been granted access. You will receive an email from noreply.identity@cummins.com with your invoice. If you do not receive the confirmation email, please reach out to marketplace@cummins.com for assistance.
If you are in need of CUMPAS access, Training Access, a QSOL user added, deleted, or Reclaim assistance please contact the Channel Support Team at one of the following email addresses. Cssna.channelsupport.north@cummins.com Cssna.channelsupport.south@cummins.com Cssna.channelsupport.west@cummins.com
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
